translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その戦いの決着はもうついた……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The outcome of that battle has already been decided..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ達、ホーネット派の敗北でな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satera and her group, the Hornet faction, were defeated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホーネット様は捕まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Hornet was captured,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ったケイブリスは次に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The victorious Cavebliss is now

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を支配しようとしている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trying to dominate the world next."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままなら、確実にそうなるだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things continue as they are, it will surely happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ……そういや、少し疑問なんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... now that you mention it, I have a bit of a question..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前らって、どっちも魔人なのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys are both demons, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人同士で戦争なんてするんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’re having a war against each other."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなの人間だって同じだろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn’t that the same as with humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えが違えば争いは起こるものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If thoughts differ, conflicts arise."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回の場合は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this case...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が魔王になるかで争いが始まった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conflict started over who would become the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ってのはアレだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King is that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物と魔人連中の王様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The king of monsters and demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、ザックリ言ってしまえばそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, roughly speaking, that's it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王とは絶対的な支配者。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King is the absolute ruler.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての魔物、使徒、魔人を従える存在だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One who commands all monsters, apostles, and demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その魔王である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先代のガイ様がいた頃は平和で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the previous lord, Guy, was around, peace reigned...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界も統一されていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the monster realm was unified."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、ガイ様が亡くなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But after Lord Guy passed away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王が空位となることで状況は変わった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Demon King's seat became vacant, and the situation changed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガイ様の遺言で新たな魔王に任命された美樹様が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Miki, who was appointed as the new Demon King according to Lord Guy's will,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王就任を嫌がり、逃げ出してしまってな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: disliked becoming the Demon King and ran away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普通に暮らしてた女の子に無理矢理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They tried to forcibly make a girl who had been living a normal life

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王やらせようとしたとかなんとか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Demon King or something..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃ逃げられるに決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course she ran away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、それで魔人共が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, that's why the demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大慌てならいい気味ってもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were all panicked, serves them right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……
美樹様の逃亡の影響は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The impact of Lady Miki's escape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなものじゃ済まなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was far more serious than that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の空位。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The vacancy of the Demon King's seat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを好機と見た魔人の一人である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One demon who saw this as an opportunity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの馬鹿がよりにもよって――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the fool Cavebliss, no less—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分が魔王になると、言い出した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: declared that he would become the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなガイ様の遺言に反すること、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such an act against Lord Guy’s will,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 認められるものか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can never be accepted!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスなど無視して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ignoring Cavebliss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹様を捜し出して魔王の座に就いて頂き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we must find Lady Miki and have her take the Demon King's throne,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界を統治してもらわなければ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she can govern the monster realm!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホーネット様を中心とする、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Many demons and monsters, centered on Lord Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの魔人と魔物がその気持ちでいたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: held that intention, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスの奴の卑怯な策略で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Through Cavebliss’s cowardly scheme,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徐々にケイブリス側に魔人や魔物が増えていき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: demons and monsters gradually joined Cavebliss's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 派閥は真っ二つに分かれ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the factions split right down the middle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我ら魔人はついに全面戦争に至った……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We demons ultimately ended up in all-out war..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input
